CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get -y install wget curl unzip
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp &&     wget --no-check-certificate --no-cookies --header "Cookie: oraclelicense=accept-securebackup-cookie" http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/$JDK_VERSION-$JDK_BUILD/$JAVA_FILE &&     wget http://download.jboss.org/jbossas/7.1/jboss-as-7.1.1.Final/jboss-as-7.1.1.Final.zip &&     tar -xzvf $JAVA_FILE &&     unzip jboss-as-7.1.1.Final.zip &&     rm -f /tmp/$JAVA_FILE &&     rm -f /tmp/jboss-as-7.1.1.Final.zip &&     mv /tmp/jdk1.7.0_75 /opt/java &&     mv /tmp/jboss-as-7.1.1.Final /opt
Commands.Name: run
